= I18n Configuration

The converter `ConfigConverterI18n` allow to convert environment variable related to i18n configuration to valid odoo CLI.

include::partial$i18n.adoc[]


== overwrite_existing_translations
Overwrites existing translation terms on updating a module or importing a csv or a po file.

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 11.0 until 18.0

The environment variable `I18N_OVERRIDE` is used and expect a `bool`.

Possible cli:

* --i18n-overwrite



== Other keys


=== <object object at 0x78756c55d530>
NOTE: Convert to load_language

The environment variable `<object object at 0x78756c55d530>` is used and expect a `set`.

=== <object object at 0x78756c55d530>
NOTE: Convert cli args=['--load-language', '-l', '--language', '--i18n-export', '--i18n-import', '--modules'] to <object object at 0x78756c55d420>

The environment variable `<object object at 0x78756c55d530>` is used and expect a `FFFFFFFFFFFFF`.
